365 Days is wild, sexy, and impossible to look away from. I absolutely love it. The story is over-the-top and dramatic, but that’s part of the fun. The scene on the boat is unreal—so intense and steamy, easily one of the most memorable adult scenes I’ve ever seen. It’s a mix of fantasy, tension, and pure indulgence, and I can watch it again and again.
